channel.title: Sreeniche- a simple comfort blog
channel.description: Recent content on Sreeniche- a simple comfort blog

item.title: Hugo
item.description: This task initially appeared challenging and overwhelming, but by the end, it seemed straightforward and simple. I began by installing Hugo and creating two GitHub repositories named “hugo” and “adarshs05.github.io.” I cloned both repositories into my Linux terminal. Next, I navigated to the “hugo” repository and used the command “hugo new site sreeniche” to create a new directory containing all the necessary tools and files to build the website. To gain a better understanding of the process, I referred to a YouTube tutorial.

item.title: My First Blog
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I love sharing some of the craziest and funniest adventure stories I’ve experienced so far. So let’s get started! Imagine you went on a holiday! It would be amazing, right? But what if, on the last day of your return journey, you realized that your passport was lost with only hours left to board the flight back. What would you do? Well, this is just a hypothetical question, but what if it really happened?
